text: "Love the Way You Lie" is a 2010 hip hop song by the American rapper Eminem and featured Barbadian singer Rihanna, and is the second single from his seventh studio album Recovery, which was released in 2010. The song was written by Eminem, A. Grant, H. Hafferman, M. Riddick. H. Hafferman is Holly Brook Hafermann who now writes and records as Skylar Grey. The song's music video stars Megan Fox and Dominic Monaghan as a couple in a violent abusive love-hate relationship.
